text: Venaria Reale is a comune in the Metropolitan City of Turin in the Piedmont region in Italy. == Main sights == * Royal Palace of Venaria (included in the UNESCO Heritage List in 1997) * Historical center, designed by Amedeo di Castellamonte in 1667-90 as a scenic background for the Royal Palace * La Mandria Regional Park == References == == Other websites == * Official website * Reggia della Venaria Reale (Royal Palace of Venaria) Category:Comunes of Turin
title: Venaria Reale
